title: Need a Doran's item with attack speed
body:
Tiny bit of attack speed. Maybe some HP like the other ones. Maybe a mini Guinsoo passive. Every attack builds 1% attack speed up to a max of 3 stacks. Something like that. It would be neat.

Edit: 2 or 3% up to 3 stacks then. Can't be huge if it's a doran's item tho. Yeesh.
